revision.text:
The Aleksany brothers are two mid-level operatives in the [[Black Market]]. They often conduct business in fancy hotels.
[[Category:Character]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Apotamo is the high priest of the [[Huari]] temple in the [[Huaramarca system]].
== See Also == * [[Apotomo (reference)]]
[[Category:Character]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The brilliant chief scientist of the [[Rasiermesser corporation]] is known throughout [[Human Space]].
[[Category:Character]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Hiro is the alias for a mysterious hacker who has created a series of innovative algorithms. He works for himself, without incorporation, selling his own ROMs.
[[Category:Character]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Mr. Katami is the player’s instructor at the [[Battle Arena Maximus]]. He was once a gladiator but now teaches others. He was [[Kate Morgental]]’s instructor when she was young.
[[Category:Character]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: /* See Also */
revision.text:
The Commonwealth was founded in 2116 by citizens of the [[NEOs]], Earth-orbiting, and Lunar colonies, after [[Earth]] enforced bans on human germ-line genetic engineering. In the next few centuries, the Commonwealth became the most powerful human sovereign and was instrumental in the fight against the [[Ares Sect]].
The Commonwealth is a federal system in which individual worlds and stations run their own internal affairs. A [[Commonwealth Parliament]] decides inter-station issues including the regulation of commerce, the relationship with other sovereigns, and defense against pirates and other threats to commerce (through the [[Commonwealth Militia]]).
The only institution not controlled by Parliament is the military. The military forces of the Commonwealth are controlled by the [[Council of Lords]], a group of seventeen people elected by the Parliament.
==Ships of the Commonwealth== {| class="wikitable" |- !width="120pt"|Ship !Role !Where Found !Manufacturer !Notes |- |Antares I-class freighter |cargo ship |New Beyond to St. Katharine's Star |[[Makayev-Energia]] |width="400pt"| |- |Antares II-class freighter |cargo ship |New Beyond to St. Katharine's Star |[[Makayev-Energia]] | |- |Antares V-class freighter |cargo ship |New Beyond to Ungoverned Territories |[[Makayev-Energia]] | |- |Britannia-class gunship |local defense |Outer Realm |[[Pacific Defense]] |width="400pt"|The top of the line space-superiority gunship is rarely seen around Commonwealth stations, but wealthy Corporate stations in dangerous regions can afford one or two. |- |Centurion-class gunship |local defense |All Human Space |[[Pacific Defense]] | |- |EI100-class freighter |cargo ship |New Beyond to St. Katharine's Star |[[Earth Industries]] | |- |EI200-class freighter |cargo ship |New Beyond to St. Katharine's Star |[[Earth Industries]] | |- |EI500-class freighter |cargo ship |New Beyond to Outer Realm |[[Earth Industries]] |width="400pt"|These are usually greatly upgraded beyond St. Katharine's Star |- |EI7000-class freighter |cargo ship |Ungoverned Territories to Outer Realm |[[Earth Industries]] | |- |Emissary-class cruiser (Corporate cruiser) |cargo ship |Ungoverned Territories to Outer Realm |[[Honoku-Tomashi]] | |- |IAV, light |local defense; private vessel |New Beyond to St. Katharine's Star |Various | |- |IAV, medium |local defense; private vessel |New Beyond to Ungoverned Territories |Various | |- |IAV, heavy |local defense; private vessel |Ungoverned Territories to Outer Realm |Various | |- |Manticore-class gunship |local defense; private vessel |Ungoverned Territories to Outer Realm |[[Makayev-Energia]] | |- |Ronin-class gunship |local defense; private vessel |All Human Space |[[Pacific Defense]] | |- |Sapphire-class yacht |private vessel |New Beyond to St. Katharine's Star |[[Zubrin Systems]] | |- |Scarab-class superfreighter |cargo ship |Ungoverned Territories to Outer Realm |[[NAMI]] | |- |Wolfen-class gunship |local defense; private vessel |New Beyond to Ungoverned Territories |[[Pacific Defense]] | |}
== See Also == * [[Commonwealth Fleet]] * [[Commonwealth Parliament]] * [[Commonwealth Transport System]] * [[Council of Lords]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The planet Earth, the third planet in the [[Sol system]], is the cradle of humanity and the standard against which all other worlds are measured. All humans and [[neo-humans]] can trace their ancestry back to Earth and the history of human life on Earth is far longer than our history among the stars.
After the rise of the [[Commonwealth]] and the [[Corporate Hierarchy]] and especially after the [[Syrtis War]], Earth decreased in importance and the [[St. Katharine's Star System]] is now considered to be the capital of humanity. Nevertheless, Earth remains an important world and the fashions, customs, and tastes of Old Earth are eagerly sought out by the citizens of the Commonwealth.
== See Also == * [[Human Space]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Humans have been improving themselves physically and mentally since the dawn of civilization, but the widespread use of genetic modification in the twenty-second century makes it difficult to speak of a single "human race". Humans can be categorized by their relationship to augmentations and enhancements (in increasing order of technological sophistication):
* [[Zoanthropes]] have jettisoned all higher brain functions and act only on instinct. * [[Simples]] have radically altered their brains to remove all violent and unpleasant emotions. * [[Luddites]] eschew all technology developed after the twenty-first century. * [[Pure humans]] use modern technology but refuse all kinds of augmentation or enhancement. * [[Augmented humans]] use technology to improve themselves but avoid all germ-line genetic modifications. * [[Enhanced humans]] employ minor germ-line genetic modifications to improve themselves. * [[Neo-humans]] have radically changed their genome and no longer appear or behave completely human.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The area of space on the edgeward side of [[St. Katharine’s Star]] is known as the New Beyond. The systems of [[Rigel Aurelius]] and [[Eridani]] are considered part of the New Beyond.
The New Beyond is mostly controlled by the [[Commonwealth]].
== See Also == * [[Human Space]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The systems between [[Jiang's Star]] and [[Heretic]] are considered to be part of the Outer Realm.
There are two branches that split off from the Jiang's Star to Heretic route. The first leads to the systems of the [[Ranx Empire]] while the second leads to the [[Ares]] homeworld in [[Aeria]].
Because of the distance and the dangers of traveling through the [[Ungoverned Territories]], the Outer Realm remains partly unexplored by the [[Commonwealth]]. [[Ringers]] are often found in Outer Realm systems, but it is not known how far their influence reaches. The [[Ranx Empire]] and the [[Teraton Host]] are also found in the Outer Realm.
The Commonwealth and the [[Ares Orthodoxy]] have been fighting a prolonged [[Ares War|war]] in the Outer Realm.
== See Also == * [[Human Space]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: moved [[St. Katharine's Star]] to [[Saint Katharine's Star]]
revision.text:
Saint Katharine's Star is a system discovered in 2124 by the [[Commonwealth]] explorer ship Independence. The third planet in the system, [[Incandescent]], is one of the only known biosphere planets in [[Human Space]].
The Saint Katharine system was originally known as the New Sun system, but was renamed in 2184.
== Planets == The closest planet to St. Katharine’s Star is known as [[Redglow]]. It is a rocky, cratered world with very little water. A stargate in orbit around this world leads to the [[Ungoverned Territories]].
[[Radiant]], a desert world, is the next planet out.
The third planet is [[Incandescent]], now the capital of the Commonwealth.
The fourth planet is a gas giant known as [[Majestic]], which has two large moons.
The fifth planet is an icy world called [[Fulgent]]. A stargate here leads to the [[New Beyond]].
The sixth and outermost planet is known as [[Tenebrous]].
== See Also == * [[Human Space]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Abbasid Survivalists are followers of al-Hakim, who prophesized in 2230 that a Flame War would destroy most of humanity, leaving only the faithful to inherit the galaxy. Many saw his prophesies come true with the start of the [[Syrtis War]] and millions were convinced to retreat to fortified outposts, where they awaited the inevitable.
After the war, many followers deserted the faith, but a few persisted in their beliefs. Today, Abbasid Survivalists continue to exist, choosing well-defended, deep-space outposts for their retreats. They attack anyone who approaches.
== Abbasid Thanograms == These rare and precious objects are optical neural networks initialized from the cerebral patterns of one or more Scholars of Abbasid. The legal, ethical, and moral knowledge of the Abbasid Survivalists is contained and interpreted by these constructs.
It is rumored that the thanogram of al-Hakim survives somewhere in [[Human Space]], but none have been able to find it.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: /* Commonwealth Star Carries */

revision.text:
==Ideas== * After a certain number of drones (or assemblers) are destroyed, Luminous will begin creating hunter-killers. These ships will have better weapons and shields. If the player destroys a certain number of hunter-killers, Luminous will create a Luminous Avatar boss and send it after the player. If the player can destroy it, the Avatar will have an intact Luminous chromatic deflector, which should be better than any other level VIII shield.
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]] [[Category:Transcendence Ideas]]

Makayev-Energia is a heavy-industries manufacturer, best known for its weapons systems.
== Shipyards == The [[Polyarny Shipyards]] on the asteroid [[Ceres]] are owned and operated by Makayev-Energia. The [[Antares freighter]] class is built in the Polyarny Shipyards.
== See Also == * [[Corporate Hierarchy]]
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: /* History */
revision.text:
The Ranx Empire is a human sovereign populating the [[Outer Realm]] near and around the [[Anhalt]] system.
== History == Human colonists from [[St. Katharine's Star]] and [[Earth]] settled the Outer Realm starting in the late 2100's. An economy based on [[pteracnium]] and [[ithalium]] ore supported a large number of stations, some associated with the Commonwealth, others of independent alignment.
From the start there were tensions between human and neo-human populations. The [[Ringers]], who began settlement of the Outer Realm in 2183, were better adapted to space and often found and exploited the richest fields of ore. Nevertheless, the vastness of the region prevented any serious conflicts.
In the second half of the 23rd century, after the end of the [[Syrtis War]] and the devastation of [[Mars]], [[Ares]] refugees poured in to the Outer Realm looking for a new home. Around the same time, the unpredictable [[Teratons]], a genetic off-shoot of the Ringers, began aggressively building their nests.
At first human colonists looked to the Commonwealth to help them keep out neo-human invaders, but the government on [[New Victoria]] was too exhausted from war and relied on the Ringers to protect their interests.
In 2276, [[Karin Nordlin]], a former mining captain from [[Anhalt]], formed the Ranx Coalition as a way to unite the human stations. Nordlin's aims were modest at first, hoping only to coordinate Commonwealth defenses against neo-human encroachment on Ranx asteroid fields. But as the movement grew, and Nordlin's followers increased, she declared sovereignty on behalf of the stations that she represented.
In the early 2300's, Karin's son [[Linus Nordlin]] was elected First Minister of the Ranx Sovereignty. A fall in the price of ithalium had devastated the economy of the Outer Realm and Nordlin and his followers felt that unfair competition from Ringers and the Ares Orthodoxy were to blame. They had a particular distate for the Ringers, who used zoanthrope [[Ferians]] to mine their asteroid fields, a practice that the Ranx equated with slave labor.
In 2311 an incident in a disputed asteroid field ignited a call to armed resistance among the Ranx. Nordlin took the opportunity to consolidate his power and shed some of the parliamentary constraints that were originally created by his mother. The Ranx began construction of a large fleet to protect their interests.
Although the Ranx fleet never challenged Ringer homes directly, it threatened enough asteroid fields that they soon became uneconomical for the Ringers to hold on to. By 2340, the Ranx had expanded their sphere of influence to a couple of the systems around Anhalt and their fortresses and outposts began appearing as far away as [[Saurus Mons]].
The last few vestiges of a parliamentary democracy were discarded by Linus Nordlin's successor, [[Paulina Ragnar]]. Ragnar, once a captain in the Ranx fleet, consolidated control of the military and purged the government of dissent. Even some members of Nordlin's family were caught up in the purge.
Another casualty of Ragnar's ascension was [[Greger Kalmar]], an engineer who worked on many of the Ranx fleet's original weapons, and who was suspected of collaborating with people loyal to the Nordlin family. He fled the Empire before an arrest order could be issued and started a new home with his family in [[Eta Ceti]]. Kalmar later worked for [[Rasiermesser]] and became Chief Scientist, a position that was later assumed by his even more brilliant son, [[Dvalin]].
In the late 2300's, the Ranx Empire expanded under Paulina Ragnar, but there was constant tension with Ringers, Teratons, and the Ares Orthodoxy.
Around the same time, exiles who were banished by Ragnar formed a dissident group under [[Gabriel Nordlin]], a nephew of Linus. Though small in number and only recently organized, this group seeks to oust Ragnar from the Imperial City. So far, however, the Ranx Empire does not seem overly concerned with them.
In recent years there have been rumors of secret ship building at Anhalt and speculation that the Ranx may be preparing for another wave of expansion.
== Notes == * Origin: Outcompeted by the Ringers? Perhaps Ferians were created by the Ranx (as slaves) until the Ringers rescued them? * Goals: The glory of the empire? To expand the realm? To bring order to their region? They are the only humans left in the Outer Realm--the other sovereigns (Ares, Ringers, Teratons) are neo-humans. Perhaps the wish to reclaim the Outer Realm on behalf of humans--whom they represent. Perhaps they admire the Commonwealth (and particularly Conrad Decker), though they are enemies. * Friends: Ares? * Enemies: Ringers, Commonwealth. * What is their relationship to the Ares Orthodoxy? (They are neutral in-game). * What is their relationship to Ringers? (They are enemies in-game). * What is their relationship to Teratons? (They are neutral in-game). * What is their relationship to Ferians? (They are neutral in-game).
== Mysteries == * The Ranx use Akan weapons. What is their relationship to [[Rasiermesser]] and to [[Dvalin]]? Perhaps the key scientists of Rasiermesser defected from the Ranx Empire?
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

== Ideas == * The name Kormoran might be good for a weapon or missile. It was the name of a WWII German cruiser. It is also used today as the name of an anti-ship missile.
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]] [[Category:Transcendence Ideas]]

The Sapiens Preservation Society started in the twenty-second century as a group opposed to germ-line genetic engineering. Over the centuries, however, this group has turned into a destructive cult bent on eradicating all humans that deviate from the ancestral gene pool.
Sapiens are a small group, relegated to the most inhospitable systems, but they sometimes deal with anarchists and many of their ship designs are based on Freeworlds Shipyard designs. Sapiens use radiation and other biohazards as their weapon of choice against the “devolved”.
== Environment == Sapiens desire to place their stations in the life zone of the system. Unfortunately, they are a small group and are seldom powerful enough to occupy such prime real estate, so they often end up with whatever room they can get in some asteroid field or orbiting a barren world at the edge of the system.
Even in the [[Sol system]], where they are most powerful, Sapiens are reduced to a single North Atlantic island on Earth and a handful of asteroid colonies.
== Leadership == Every Sapiens station is populated by a single “clan” (sometimes a few clans connected by intermarriage). Within each clan, leadership passes from parent to child (or to cousins, if a leader has no surviving children).
The Mother Clan is the original Sapiens clan that began the movement on Earth. The Mother Clan is led by Angela G. K. Concord, who is a direct descendant of Karen Angela Concord, the movement’s founder.
The Mother Clan does not have formal authority over the other clans, but as the wealthiest clan, it does give money to the other clans and thus influences them indirectly.
=== Family Tree === {| class="wikitable" |- !width="60pt"|Year!!Event |- |2087||Karen Angela Concord born |- |2111||Michael Frederick Jarvis-Concord born to K. A. Concord (first child). |- |2114||K. A. Concord founds Sapiens Preservation Society on Earth. |- |2146||Karen Jarvis Concord born to M. F. Jarvis-Concord (first child). |- |2177||Jason Frederick Concord born to K. J. Concord (first child). |- |2206||Angela Genevieve Concord born to J. F. Concord (second child). |- |2239||Michael Harold Concord born to A. G. Concord (first child). |- |2281||Michael Patrick Concord born to M. H. Concord (first child). |- |2311||Nathan Frederick Concord born to M. P. Concord (third child). |- |2343||Angela G. K. Concord born to N. F. Concord (second child). |}
== Goals & Desires == The Sapiens began as a movement opposed to germ-line genetic modification, but now they seek nothing less than the extermination of any “impure” humans.
On Earth, the movement downplays these beliefs and does not actively attack other races. But in Commonwealth space, more radical clans attack anyone who approaches.
== Threats & Fears == Sapiens believe that all of the problems of Humanity are caused by ignoring the true nature of being human. They fear the corruption of nature embodied in genetic engineering.
== Powers == Though Sapiens refuse to use any kind of human genetic technology, they adopt and use any other kind of technology (including, occasionally, genetic engineering of non-human creatures).
Sapiens have particular mastery of nuclear technology.
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The UAS is a Terran sovereign that controls most of the African continent of [[Earth]] and many of the [[near-Earth asteroids]].
The UAS often finds itself at odds with the [[Corporate Hierarchy]] because of corporations' defiance of UAS laws. Although the UAS has never openly fought the corporations, it does occasionally supply ships and weapons to the enemies of the Hierarchy.
The UAS has founded many colonies in [[Human Space]], principally in the [[Kibo star system]].
== Ship Designs == UAS ships are designed for use in asteroid fields and so they are generally slow and bulky but well-armored. The Borer class is the basic workhorse for miners.
Another popular design is the Zulu-class gunship, which is light and maneuverable and ideal for cheap defenses.
== See Also == * [[United African Shipyards]]
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

In 2194, the [[Urak system]] was colonized by Russian exiles from [[Earth]] and [[Luna]]. The colonies prospered in the first half of the twenty-third century, mostly on the strength of [[ceralloy]] prices.
In 2247, an outbreak of [[phobos aerium]] decimated the population. With many other systems occupied by war, few were able to help the Urak and the system descended into chaos.
In 2276, one warlord clan triumphed over the others and imposed a strict military order in the system.
== See Also == * [[Urak system]]
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

When the [[Corporate Hierarchy]] put out bids to build a new cruiser, the [[Makayev Corporation]] designed a heavy cruiser codenamed "Omsk". Makayev, not generally known for starship design, had a lot to prove and the Omsk was a very ambitious design. In the end, technical problems led to the cancelation of the project, but not before Makayev spent billions of credits.
Fortunately, Makayev was able to salvage some of the components, and the innovative [[Omsk defense system]] is an offshoots of the original project.
==Ideas== * Who won the bid to create the Corporate Cruiser? Probably Taikon or Bushido. Perhaps Makayev feels a bitter rivalry. * Perhaps a prototype of the Omsk was built; it would probably be a monstrosity, like a scaled up [[Manticore]].
==See Also== * [[Omsk Defense System]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]] [[Category:Transcendence Ideas]]

==Mission Ideas== * A random encounter: a freighter is out of fuel. If the player provides fuel, then the freighter will repay the player. But there is a time limit: the freighter is rescued automatically after a set period of time. * Bring a random luxury item to a rich client on New Victoria. * Assassinate another ship out of sight of the militia. * Steal corporate secrets from a ship entering the system. * Take out one of the enemy stations at the edge of the system. * Bring death drugs to a poor neighborhood. * Do a mission for New Victoria University. [Drop a probe in the outer system and defend it.]
[[Category:Encounter]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]] [[Category:Transcendence Ideas]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'Gaian Terraformers are descended from the [[Ringers]]. They possess the technology to control immense energies, which they use to terraform worlds. Unfortunately, they consider a…'
revision.text:
Gaian Terraformers are descended from the [[Ringers]]. They possess the technology to control immense energies, which they use to terraform worlds. Unfortunately, they consider all other human races as inferior and have no problem destroying their worlds and their works.
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'The Honoku Corporation started in 2162 as an importer of low-cost goods for the growing population of the [[Incandescent]] colony. By 2230, Honoku had diversified to become a man…'
revision.text:
The Honoku Corporation started in 2162 as an importer of low-cost goods for the growing population of the [[Incandescent]] colony. By 2230, Honoku had diversified to become a manufacturer of consumer goods, industrial equipment, and space systems.
After the [[Syrtis War]], Honoku merged with Tomashi Star Systems, a designer and manufacturer of military starships and weapon systems. Throughout the 2300’s Honoku-Tomashi grew by forming ownership relationships with various smaller companies across [[Human Space]]. It allied with [[InfoNet Publishing]] in 2301, with [[Bushido Corporation]] in 2334, and with [[Habitat Holdings]] in 2340.
== See Also == * [[Corporate Hierarchy]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

{| class="wikitable" |- !width="150pt"|Domain |width="300pt"|[[Carbosilicate]] |- !width="150pt"|Ancestry |width="300pt"|Evolved from [[Iokoa]] |- !Compact |Cultured |- !Alignment |[[Republic]] |- !Technology |[[Mechanist]] |- !Emergence |19.18.73.357 |- |}
== History == The Iocrym are an ancient, alien race that visited [[Human Space]] in 2363. They are one of four ancient races that serve as guardians of the Galaxy. The Iocrym race guards the periphery and often deals with internal issues, such as first contact with intelligent species. In their racial hierarchy, which is difficult to understand, the Iocrym are associated with ice and stasis.
Although rumors of alien ships began almost as soon as humans left Earth, the first confirmed sighting of an alien vessel occurred in the Sanctuary star system when a freighter captain ran across a small fleet of Iocrym sentinels.
Soon afterwards, the Iocrym ships reached [[St. Katharine's Star]] and began a series of communication attempts. The Iocrym mastered human language after a few weeks—although some experts believe that Iocrym AIs are translating human language for the Iocrym.
After a brief exchange of information, which yielded many technological advances, the Iocrym proceeded towards [[Sol]].
A similar exchange of information occurred with experts in Sol. The Iocrym were particularly interested in human history, spending much time trying to understand the sequence of events that led to humans leaving our native solar system.
In 2364, the Iocrym left Human Space and have yet to return.
== See Also == * [[Ancient Races]] * [[Heretic Stargate]]
[[Category:Sovereign]] {{TEC}}

The star systems between [[St. Katharine’s Star]] and [[Jiang’s Star]] are known as the Ungoverned Territories.
In the 2120s, colonists from [[Centauri]] settled in the [[Loriol system]]. In the 2150s, a loose collection of stations formed the [[Huari Empire]] and conquered many of the surrounding systems.
In the 2280s, the Huari Empire was displaced by the [[Sung Slavers]] of Jiang’s Star.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Meteorsteel is an exotic alloy invented by the [[Bennin Xenophobes]]. Meteorsteel is extremely strong and capable of enduring higher energy densities than plasteel and orthosteel.
The ferromagnetic properties of this alloy interfere will most force fields, including those produced by shield generators. Because of this incompatibility, most starship manufacturers abandoned the use of meteorsteel.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'This exotic seaweed grows only in the subterranean water havens of [[Mars]]. Martian nori is strongly hallucinogenic if consumed and is consequently banned throughout most of [[H…'
revision.text:
This exotic seaweed grows only in the subterranean water havens of [[Mars]]. Martian nori is strongly hallucinogenic if consumed and is consequently banned throughout most of [[Human Space]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'The Kabuto Defense Corporation is a small corporate entity that specializes in deflector shields for commercial and military starships. They are a subsidiary of [[Honoku-Tomashi …'
revision.text:
The Kabuto Defense Corporation is a small corporate entity that specializes in deflector shields for commercial and military starships. They are a subsidiary of [[Honoku-Tomashi Keiretsu]]. Their most popular line is the Yoroi series of shields ranging from the inexpensive S100 to the military-grade MX version.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'Ithalium is a rare ore found on volcanic worlds. Alloys of ithalium are particularly resistant to thermonuclear energy. [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]'
revision.text:
Ithalium is a rare ore found on volcanic worlds. Alloys of ithalium are particularly resistant to thermonuclear energy.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: moved [[Ice farmers]] to [[Ice farmer]]
revision.text:
Ice farmers grow special crops adapted to the frozen terrain of comets and asteroids. The most lucrative crop is [[Europan ice moss]], which can command high prices in the finer restaurants of the [[Commonwealth]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The third planet in the [[St. Katharine's Star system]], Incandescent, is one of only three planets in [[Human Space]] known to have a biosphere.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Jiang's Star is a star system in the [[Ungoverned Territories]], populated in 2154 by dissidents fleeing persecution in the [[Asian Pacific Directorate]]. Today the system is controlled by the [[Sung Slavers]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Admiral Conrad Decker commands the [[Commonwealth Fleet]] aboard the flagship [[CSC Terra]]. He is smart, just, and brave, and has led the Fleet with distinction, especially through the last, difficult decade. Decker is admired throughout the Fleet by both officers and enlisted, and though there is much dissatisfaction with the conduct of the war, most of the anger is directed at the [[Commonwealth]] leadership in [[St. Katharine’s]]. Admiral Decker demands loyalty most of all from his Fleet—mistakes and other weaknesses can be forgiven and corrected, but he will not forget treachery. His greatest fear is that the Commonwealth leadership will tire of the [[Ares War|war]] and abandon the [[Outer Realm]] and the Fleet to the mercy of the Ares.
== See Also == * [[Admiral Decker and the CSC Antarctica]]
[[Category:Character]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia|Decker, Conrad]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'The war-torn systems between Commonwealth space and the [[Ares Orthodoxy]] are the domain of the Kobol Warlords. In systems where every ship is armed, there is no shortage of rec…'
revision.text:
The war-torn systems between Commonwealth space and the [[Ares Orthodoxy]] are the domain of the Kobol Warlords. In systems where every ship is armed, there is no shortage of recruits for the warlords. Mercenaries and rogue fleet officers make up the senior ranks but gunship pilots and crew come from the desperate mass of refugees left homeless by the war.
Almost all refugee camps in the area are controlled by the warlords. They will buy weapons at a low price.
[[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: moved [[Zoanthropes]] to [[Zoanthrope]]
revision.text:
The term zoanthrope refers to any human race that has bred out the abstract intellectual capacity of pure humans. These races retain some vestiges of human behavior but otherwise rely entirely on instinct. Zoanthropes have reverted to the innocence of animals and as such are both enslaved and protected by other humans.
Zonathropes are immune to the influence of [[Domina]] and [[Oracus]].
== See Also == * [[Human augmentations & enhancements]] * [[Zoanthrope Refuge]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

A rare infectious disease that attacks the central nervous system. The disease is airborne and spreads through breath and sweat. Some strains of phobos aerium are untreatable even by [[hypermycin]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'Quadrocarbide is a form of carbide manufactured by [[Taikon Ventures]]. [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]'
revision.text:
Quadrocarbide is a form of carbide manufactured by [[Taikon Ventures]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'Xenotite was one of the first minerals to be discovered in another star system. Xenotite can be refined to produce a fuel for antimatter reactors. [[Category:Transcendence Encyc…'
revision.text:
Xenotite was one of the first minerals to be discovered in another star system. Xenotite can be refined to produce a fuel for antimatter reactors.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The Assembler Corporation is a large nanofacturer that produces industrial and military materials. They are the prime manufacturer of diamond lattice.
== See Also == * [[Corporate Hierarchy]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

== Explore == Let's face it: most people don't consider interplanetary shipping to be a sexy occupation. 3DV catalogs are filled with the exploits of the Fleet or even the Commonwealth Militia, but (other than the fringe series 'Antares Heavy') no one chronicles the day-to-day challenges of the freighter captain or the men and women who keep it safe.
That's a shame because the life of a freighter escort captain can be very exciting. In the less-populated systems of the New Beyond, the dangers from pirates and outlaws can be extreme. Fighting off a wave of Corsair-class gunships while defending a 12-kiloton freighter requires sharp skills and a strong protective instinct. And the pay is pretty good too.
The Korolov Shipping Corporation is the largest (and oldest) shipping company in Human Space. They have some of the most experienced escort pilots and are trusted by all the Commonwealth to ship expensive goods anywhere.
If you want to be an escort pilot for Korolov (and who wouldn't?) you'll want to make sure that you and your ship are ready. Lasers are probably your best option against the kinds of threats that you'll encounter, the bigger the better. But don't neglect your shields: Sometimes you'll need to interpose yourself between the freighter you're protecting and an incoming missile.
To be a successful escort pilot you also need to do some planning before you go out. The more valuable the cargo, the more powerful the threat against it. Don't accept a request to escort a cargo load beyond your abilities. At the same time, managers at Korolov like their escort pilots to have wide-ranging experience; Make sure you escort a variety of freighters, from the tiny EI100s to the massive Antares Vs.
So if you think you've got what it takes, visit the nearest Korolov Shipping station and ask for a mission.
== Miscellaneous == * One of the largest corporations in Human Space; their freighters can be seen anywhere from Starton Eridani to St. Katharine's Star all the way out to Sol.
[[Category:Encounter]] [[Category:Sovereign]] [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Centauri is a triple-star system a little over four light-years away from [[Earth]].
The [[Kuiper Stargate]] leads to the Centauri system, the first star system outside of [[Sol]] to be colonized by humans.
The [[North Atlantic Union]] reached the Centauri system in 2100. Later, in 2120, the [[Commonwealth]] founded the first colony in Centauri.

Kibo is a star system near [[Sol]]. It was first colonized by the [[United African States]] in 2123. It is the site of the UAS's principal [[United African Shipyards|shipyard]].

revision.comment: Created page with 'Protons, neutrons, and electrons, the constituents of ordinary matter, have associated antiparticles with the same mass but opposite electric charge. When these antiparticles for…'
revision.text:
Protons, neutrons, and electrons, the constituents of ordinary matter, have associated antiparticles with the same mass but opposite electric charge. When these antiparticles form antiatoms, they are known as antimatter.
When matter and antimatter meet, they anihilate and release immense quantities of energy. This property can be used to generate power or to create formidable weapons.
== Antimatter Power == Antimatter reactors are simple: any quantity of antimatter will generate immense energy when in contact with ordinary matter. The problem has always been obtaining the antimatter fuel—Earth contains no deposits of antimatter minerals.
As humans explored other worlds, however, minerals that contained antimatter particles were soon found. [[Pteracnium]] is one of the most common sources of antimatter. [[Xenotite]] and [[chronimium]] are other common sources.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

An arc is a unit of Galactic time equal to 780 [[generi]]. There are two-hundred arc in a [[trisem]].
In human terms, an arc is roughly 35,275 years. In early galactic history, an arc was considered the average lifespan of a civilization or sovereign.
== See Also == * [[Galactic timeline]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'An asteroid mine is a structure, often inhabited, desiged to mine valuable ores and mineral from asteroids. == Unlicensed Mines == Unlicensed asteroid mines can be found in many…'
revision.text:
An asteroid mine is a structure, often inhabited, desiged to mine valuable ores and mineral from asteroids.
== Unlicensed Mines == Unlicensed asteroid mines can be found in many [[Commonwealth]] systems. These wildcat operations avoid both [[Corporate]] profit-sharing and Commonwealth taxes. In exchange, however, they need to defend themselves against both rival miners and the [[Commonwealth Militia]].
Although the [[mining lasers]] on [[Borer-class]] ships are a powerful deterrent, unlicensed miners often hire mercenaries for additional protection.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'Augmented humans refuse any kind of [[germ-line engineering]] but they take advantage of other technological augmentations. Drugs, prostheses, and surgical alteration are all acc…'
revision.text:
Augmented humans refuse any kind of [[germ-line engineering]] but they take advantage of other technological augmentations. Drugs, prostheses, and surgical alteration are all accepted by these humans, as long as they are voluntary and they are designed to improve. The mainline descendants of [[Earth]] tend to fall into this category.
== See Also == * [[Human augmentation & enhancement]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

An auton is an autonomous ship, generally smaller than a gunship, and designed to support and/or defend a larger, crewed vessel.
The most popular autons are manufactured and sold by [[OmniDefense Systems]].
== See Also == * [[Auton (reference)]]

revision.comment: /* Eighteenth Orbis */
revision.text:
== First Orbis == * 1.1.1.1: ~4.25 billion years ago. * 1.1.1.1: First intelligent life appears in the galaxy.
== Ninth Orbis == * 9.1.1.1: ~2.55 billion years ago. * 9.8.166.---: [[Nebular life]] evolves.
== Eleventh Orbis == * 11.1.1.1: ~2.13 billion years ago. * 11.18.150.---: Extinction of [[Majellen civilization]] and 90% of intelligent life.
== Twelfth Orbis == * 12.1.1.1: ~1.92 billion years ago. * 12.15.138.355: Beginning of [[Aestari]] civilization.
== Fifteenth Orbis == * 15.1.1.1: ~1.28 billion years ago. * 15.23.144.577: Beginning of [[Core-Halo War]]. * 15.26.102.369: Truce between Core and Halo. * 15.26.102.767: [[Oracus]] and [[Domina]] at the Galactic Core (~1.1 billion years ago). * 15.26.181.111: Beginning of [[Daazhen]] civilization.
== Sixteenth Orbis == * 16.1.1.1: ~1.07 billion years ago. * 16.8.136.43: Start of [[Galactic Civil War]]. * 16.11.54.183: Oracus and Domina intervene in Civil War. * 16.11.54.189: End of Civil War and creation of the immortal [[Archons]] and rules for the [[Ancient Races]]. * 16.11.54.638: Beginning of [[Oduduwa]] civilization. * 16.11.55.343: [[B-nine]] emancipated. * 16.13.42.679: [[Illianloo]] foundation begins.
== Seventeenth Orbis == * 17.1.1.1: ~861 million years ago.
== Eighteenth Orbis == * 18.1.1.1: ~649 million years ago. * 18.17.150.---: On [[Earth]], Cambrian explosion creates vast variety of multicellular lifeforms. * 18.18.51.440: [[Reenu]] created by [[Onawa]].
== Nineteenth Orbis == * 19.1.1.1: ~437 million years ago. * 19.18.51.539: Beginning of [[Oracus War]]. (~316 million years ago). * 19.18.53.382: Collapse of [[Ctoron]] civilization. * 19.18.72.232: End of war with Oracus (war lasted ~730,000 years). * 19.18.72.465: Creation of the [[Cenotropes]] to guard the tomb of Oracus. * 19.18.73.357: Creation of the [[Iocrym]] to monitor new ascensions. * 19.18.171.779: Beginning of [[Tor Quan]] civilization. * 19.20.123.722: Creation of [[Erebien]] republic. * 19.26.169.485: [[Iocrym]] survey vessels reach Earth and detect complex life; Kuiper gate is shut down. * 19.28.115.423: [[Efreet]] civilization diverges from [[Ee-dee]].
== Twentieth Orbis == * 20.1.1.1: ~226 million years ago. * 20.4.34.177: [[Thesiphons]] begin colonization.
== Twenty-First Orbis == * 21.1.1.1: ~14 million years ago. * 21.2.198.473: Present day
== Notes == * Present time is 21.2.198.473. * One [[orbis]] equals 211.65 million years. * 30 [[trisem]] make up an orbis. * 200 [[arc]] make up a trisem. * 780 [[generi]] make up an arc. * 1 generi equals ~45 years. * There are 4,680,000 generi in an orbis.

revision.comment: /* 23rd Century */
revision.text:
== 21st Century == * 2018: Twelve countries, including China, Thailand, and Malaysia form [[Asian Pacific Directorate]] to counter-balance US power. * 2022: First orbital power station created by [[Earth Industries]]. * 2024: After Korean incident, embryonic union of US and EU becomes [[North Atlantic Union]]. * 2024: Research Lunar colony founded by [[North Atlantic Union]]. * 2043: [[Corporate Hierarchy]] formed by [[Earth Industries]], [[NAMI]], and [[Pacific Defense]] to coordinate exploitation of space resources. * 2049: [[NEO]] mining colony founded by Earth Industries. * 2055: Lunar mining colony founded by NAMI. * 2056: [[Asteroid belt]] mining colonies founded by [[UAS]]. * 2058: [[United African Shipyards]] built in Earth orbit. * 2067: Martian colony founded by Asian Pacific Directorate. * 2071: [[Clavius Insurance Conglomerate]] founded on [[NAMI Lunar Colony]]. * 2077: UAS scientists in asteroid belt receive extra-terrestrial signals; impossible to decipher. * 2083: [[Celeste Cabrillo]] is first human born in space. * 2089: [[Europa]] colony founded by Asian Pacific Directorate. * 2098: [[Kuiper anomaly]] explored by North Atlantic Union; stargate discovered. * 2100: First mission (North Atlantic Union) to enter Kuiper stargate reaches [[Centauri system]].
== 22nd Century == * 2101: North Atlantic Union founds stations around [[Ganymede]]. * 2102: First colony on [[Titan]] founded. * 2103: [[Humboldt Rebellion]] is suppressed by combined Corporate Hierarchy and North Atlantic Union forces. * 2111: [[Sirius system]] colony founded by [[extopians]]; beginning of [[Concatenated Digital Metropolis]]. * 2115: Start of [[Gene Crisis]]. Genetic engineering banned; armed ships sent to enforce laws. * 2116: [[Commonwealth]] founded; first members are: NEO colonies, Lunar colonies, and Earth-orbiting stations. * 2118: Supporters of genetic engineering found Syrtis colony on Mars. * 2118: [[Ringers Collective]] founded in Saturn’s rings. * 2120: Commonwealth colony founded in [[Centauri system]]. * 2120: Ancestors of the [[Huari]] begin settlement in the [[Loriol system]]. * 2123: UAS colony founded in [[Kibo system]]. * 2124: Commonwealth explorer ship ''[[Independence (ship)|Independence]]'' reaches [[St. Katharine's Star system]] (then called "New Sun"). * 2125: Commonwealth colony founded in Kibo system. * 2127: [[Treaty of Clavius]] between Commonwealth and Corporate Hierarchy. Hierarchy is granted right of free trade in all Commonwealth areas, in exchange for recognizing Commonwealth jurisdiction. * 2128: Incandescent colony founded in October by Commonwealth merchants. * 2137: Jovian colonies join Commonwealth. * 2140: Commonwealth colony founded on Rigel Aurelius. * 2154: Dissidents from Asian Pacific Directorate found colony on [[Jiang's Star system]]. * 2154: [[Huari Empire]] declared. * 2155: [[Sisters of Domina]], led by [[St. Eugenia]], build temple in [[Sanctuary system]]. * 2161: [[St. Victoria]] leaves on a journey to the Core. * 2162: [[Honoku Corporation]] founded. * 2163: Titan colony joins Commonwealth. * 2169: [[Freeworlds]] founded in [[Centauri]] by disenfranchised Commonwealth and corporate citizens. * 2176: Commonwealth colony founded in [[Eridani system]]. * 2183: [[Ringers]] from Saturn begin to colonize the [[Outer Realm]]. * 2184: The [[New Sun]] system renamed to [[St. Katharine's Star]]. * 2189: Charon Pirates begin raiding Earth-Titan run. * 2194: [[Urak system]] colonized.
== 23rd Century == * 2204: [[EI]] completes [[Theia Shipyards]] at Earth-Sun L5 point. * 2230: [[Syrtis Conclave]] invades Asian Pacific colonies on Mars and UAS Belt colonies; start of [[Syrtis War]]. * 2230: [[al-Hakim]] prophesizes that a Flame War will destroy humanity. [[Abbasid Survivalists]] founded. * 2236: [[Earth Fleet]] (formed by the three major Earth powers) is destroyed in Martian orbit. * 2238: Syrtis launches surprise attack on major Commonwealth NEO colonies. * 2238: Commonwealth votes to go to war against Syrtis Conclave. * 2238: Commonwealth shipyards in Centauri begin building cruisers and gunships for Syrtis War. * 2242: Commonwealth Lunar colonies occupied by Syrtis Conclave. * 2243: Syrtis fleet enters Earth orbit; nuclear bombing kills millions. * 2247: [[Phobos aerium]] devastates Urak system colonies. * 2251: Commonwealth invades Mars; nukes much of it from orbit; end of Syrtis War. * 2251: Ares Sect driven outside of Commonwealth space; begin colonies in [[Aeria]] system. * 2263: Construction of [[Polyarny Shipyards]] begins around [[Ceres]]. * 2265: [[Sung Slavers]] begin to displace [[Huari Empire]]. * 2278: [[Battle Arena Maximus]] constructed in [[Rigel Aurelius system]]. * 2288: [[Exoarcheological Society]] founded. * 2297: [[OmniDefense Systems]] begins selling [[autons]] for corporate defense.
== 24th Century == * 2301: [[Honoku-Tomashi]] buys [[InfoNet Publishing]]. * 2311: [[Adventurer Outfitters]] founded. * 2334: [[Conrad Decker]] born in [[Cairn system]]. * 2334: [[Honoku-Tomashi]] gains control of [[Bushido Corporation]]. * 2340: [[Honoku-Tomashi]] gains control of [[Habitat Holdings]]. * 2342: Start of [[Ares War]]. * 2352: [[Point Vespa]] completed in [[Outer Realm]]. * 2353: First [[Commonwealth star carrier]], ''[[CSC Europa]]'', deployed. Eleven more carriers built by 2357. * 2363: [[Iocrym]] first contact at [[St. Katharine's Star]]. * 2364: [[Iocrym]] scouts reach Earth; they conclude that Humans are a new blight and must be quarantined. * 2372: [[Point Vesta]] destroyed by [[Ares Orthodoxy]]. * 2373: Two CSCs destroyed by Ares Orthodoxy. Beginning of pause in war. * 2398: [[Rogue Fleet]] formed by rebel captains.
== 25th Century == * 2416: Ares War resumes with [[Battle of Point Pallas]]. * 2416: [[Point Pallas]] destroyed by [[Ares Orthodoxy]]. * 2419: Beginning of events in ''[[The Stars of the Pilgrim]]''.
{{TEC}} {{TRC}}

revision.comment: Created page with 'Energy permeates the universe, and even the most perfect vacuum is filled with virtual energy from quantum fluctuations. This energy, known as zero-point energy, can, in principl…'
revision.text:
Energy permeates the universe, and even the most perfect vacuum is filled with virtual energy from quantum fluctuations. This energy, known as zero-point energy, can, in principle, be tapped for useful purposes.
Since the twenty second century, scientists have been able to extract zero-point energy from [[hadron archeolith]] using an exotic vacuum state as a ground level.
The [[Commonwealth]] currently does not have any working zero-point energy reactors. [[Ringers]], however, have been able to harness this energy in limited ways.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

United African Shipyards, located in the [[Kibo]] star system, is the [[UAS]]-owned shipyards monopoly. Founded in 2058 in [[Earth]] orbit, the United African Shipyard moved to the Kibo star system soon after it was colonized.
Though not known for particularly innovative designs, the United African Shipyards has produced some of the most popular ship classes in Human Space. Most of their designs are rugged and reliable.
Most ship classes are named after African tribes.
== Mining Ship Designs == The United African Shipyards are the acknowledged experts in mining ship design, an understandable accomplishment given the fact that so much of the UAS economy is based on asteroid mining. The ''[[Borer (ship class)|Borer]]'' class is the basic workhorse for miners. Other mining ship classes include the ''Bantu'' class and the ''Pangwe'' class.
== Gunship Designs == The UAS has created a wide variety of gunship designs and many are still being used by local militias or outlaw groups. The ''[[Zulu (ship class)|Zulu]]'' class is one of the oldest designs still in service.
Other classes include the ''Ashanti'', ''Dogon'', ''Kikuyu'', ''Oromo'', ''Sotho'', ''Upale'', and ''Wutu''.
== Capital Ship Designs == Capital ship classes are named after mountains of Africa: ''Uhuro'', ''Kilimajaro'', ''Kirinyaga'', ''Mikeno'', and ''Gahinga''.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

A trisem is a unit of Galactic time corresponding to 1/30th of an [[orbis]], roughly 7 million years. In the first [[quinary]], a trisem corresponded roughly to the average lifespan of an intelligent species.
== See Also == * [[Galactic timeline]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

Transpace is the higher dimensional plane accessed by [[stargates]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'The Belt is the colloquial name for the region of asteroids around Sol between Mars and Jupiter. The [[United African States]] founded mining colonies on [[Ceres]] in 2056. [[C…'
revision.text:
The Belt is the colloquial name for the region of asteroids around Sol between Mars and Jupiter.
The [[United African States]] founded mining colonies on [[Ceres]] in 2056.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The Order of Saint Bennin is an order of the [[Church of the Sisters of Domina]]. It is the most selfless and sacrificial of all the sects.
== Ideas == The monasteries of this order will always provide free fuel to any traveler and ask only for a voluntary donation. Sometimes, however, they run out of fuel because Marauders and others take advantage of their hospitality. Perhaps the player can make sure that only the truly needed are helped.
The player is free to pay anything she wishes for the fuel (including nothing). The more fuel she takes without paying, the more the surrounding stations (e.g., habitats and slums) suffer. But if she pays more money for fuel, the surrounding stations prosper. Also, there are Marauders around that steal the fuel. If the player destroys them, there is more fuel for everyone and the stations prosper.
The player gets no benefit from this, but there is a display at the Order that tells the player the conditions of the surrounding people.
== Mysteries == Is there a connection between Saint Bennin and the Bennin Xenophobes? Perhaps Saint Bennin helped to create the Xenophobes and now he has repented. Or perhaps both came from the same station/culture/environment.
== See Also == * [[Sisters of Domina]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]] [[Category:Transcendence Ideas]]

revision.comment: moved [[Order of St. Josephine]] to [[Order of Saint Josephine]]
revision.text:
The Order of Saint Josephine is a sect of the [[Sisters of Domina]] that believes in the prophesy of a flame deluge that will purge humanity.
Sister [[Colleen McMurray]] is the head of the order.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

This is an exotic state of matter that can support extremely high energy densities. It is used in zero-point energy generators.

revision.comment: Created page with 'Cancer dust is the street name for a complex blend of oncokillers and nanomachines that cures most forms of human cancer. The formulation is patented and sold under license only…'
revision.text:
Cancer dust is the street name for a complex blend of oncokillers and nanomachines that cures most forms of human cancer.
The formulation is patented and sold under license only to the wealthiest members of the [[Commonwealth]] and [[Corporate Hierarchy]]. It is believed that a full, legal course of cancer dust treatments is sold for at least one million credits, depending on the assets of the patient.
There are various illegal, reverse-engineered versions of cancer dust, most distributed by the [[Death Drugs Cartel]].
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The CAT M520 is one of the largest machines they produce. It is used for construction and salvage.

revision.comment: Created page with 'The Clavius Insurance Conglomerate is one of the oldest hazard insurance corporations in [[Human Space]]. Founded on the [[NAMI Lunar Colony]] in 2071, the Clavius Insurance Cong…'
revision.text:
The Clavius Insurance Conglomerate is one of the oldest hazard insurance corporations in [[Human Space]]. Founded on the [[NAMI Lunar Colony]] in 2071, the Clavius Insurance Conglomerate now has branches in most human star systems and deals in all forms of insurance and risk management.
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'The Commonwealth Transport System is the bureaucracy that manages the [[stargates]] throughout [[Commonwealth]] space. The CTS also licenses commercial captains and other starshi…'
revision.text:
The Commonwealth Transport System is the bureaucracy that manages the [[stargates]] throughout [[Commonwealth]] space. The CTS also licenses commercial captains and other starship crew.
== See Also == * [[Commonwealth]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

The citizens of the Concatenated Digital Metropolis live entirely in a networked cyberspace whose nodes orbit in a ring around a planet in the [[Sirius]] star system. Biological entities cannot become citizens of the CDM although they are often used as contract labor to maintain the cyberspace nodes.
The CDM has immense knowledge of neural networks, and artificial intelligence. Almost any computational problem can be solved faster and more accurately by the CDM. Because the citizens of the CMD have no material needs except for energy, they tend to value information above all else. For example, the CDM generally accepts a recorded neural pattern as payment for their services.
== See Also == * [[Seven Wonders of Human Space]]
[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'The Commonwealth Council of Lords is the highest executive body of the [[Commonwealth]]. The Council of Lords is responsible for all military and diplomatic actions of the Common…'
revision.text:
The Commonwealth Council of Lords is the highest executive body of the [[Commonwealth]]. The Council of Lords is responsible for all military and diplomatic actions of the Commonwealth. The [[Commonwealth Fleet]] answers only to the Council of Lords.

[[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]

revision.comment: Created page with 'Cyanavir is the trade-name for a class of antiviral drugs effective against various families of filoviruses. [[Category:Transcendence Encyclopedia]]'
